Annual trends

Source: R/utils.R
annual_trends.Rd

Compute annual mean, max and min for the selected dataset within a year range.

Usage

annual_trends(
  data_type = c("climate", "fwi"),
  start_year = 1900,
  end_year = 2025
)

Arguments

data_type

One of "climate" or "fwi".

start_year

Start year (inclusive).

end_year

End year (inclusive).

Value

A tibble with columns Year, Annual_Mean, Annual_Max, Annual_Min.

Examples

annual_trends("climate", 2000, 2020)
#> # A tibble: 21 × 4
#>     Year Annual_Mean Annual_Max Annual_Min
#>    <int>       <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1  2000       0.392       0.56       0.24
#>  2  2001       0.532       0.72       0.43
#>  3  2002       0.628       0.88       0.44
#>  4  2003       0.614       0.74       0.47
#>  5  2004       0.532       0.73       0.26
#>  6  2005       0.676       0.76       0.6 
#>  7  2006       0.635       0.79       0.46
#>  8  2007       0.659       1.01       0.49
#>  9  2008       0.54        0.74       0.29
#> 10  2009       0.654       0.79       0.53
#> # ℹ 11 more rows
